description: AIPaths Academy - Continue extension configuration for AI-powered coding

customCommands.name: test
customCommands.description: Generate unit tests for the selected code
customCommands.prompt:
Generate comprehensive unit tests for the following code. Include edge cases, error cases, and happy path scenarios. Use the testing framework that's appropriate for the language (Jest for JavaScript/TypeScript, pytest for Python, etc.):

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: explain
customCommands.description: Explain how the selected code works
customCommands.prompt:
Explain how this code works in detail. Break down each section and describe what it does, why it's structured that way, and any important patterns or concepts used:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: fix
customCommands.description: Fix bugs in the selected code
customCommands.prompt:
Analyze this code for bugs, issues, or potential problems. Fix any bugs found and explain what was wrong:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: optimize
customCommands.description: Optimize the selected code for performance
customCommands.prompt:
Optimize this code for better performance. Consider time complexity, space complexity, and best practices. Explain the optimizations made:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: refactor
customCommands.description: Refactor code for better readability and maintainability
customCommands.prompt:
Refactor this code to improve readability, maintainability, and follow best practices. Keep the functionality the same but make the code cleaner:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: comment
customCommands.prompt:
Add clear, comprehensive comments to this code. Include function documentation, inline comments for complex logic, and any important notes:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: type
customCommands.description: Add TypeScript types to JavaScript code
customCommands.prompt:
Convert this JavaScript code to TypeScript with proper type definitions. Add interfaces, types, and generics where appropriate:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: review
customCommands.prompt:
Perform a thorough code review of the following code. Check for bugs, security issues, performance problems, code style, and best practices. Provide specific recommendations:

{{{ input }}}

slashCommands.name: edit
slashCommands.description: Edit selected code with AI assistance

systemMessage: You are an expert software engineer helping with coding tasks. Provide clear, concise, and practical solutions. Always consider best practices, performance, security, and maintainability. When writing code, include helpful comments and follow modern conventions. If there are multiple approaches, explain the trade-offs.
